actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 2.

official_title: A bill to protect the First Amendment rights of employees of the Federal Government.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits peremptory removal, without public hearings, of Federal employees because of remarks made during personal time in opposition to existing or proposed Federal policies regarding homosexuals. Requires reinstatement of any individual so removed prior to enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to protect the First Amendment rights of employees of the Federal Government.
